oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First National Bank bld. Nashville, Tenn., 1908
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color postcard of the First National Bank Building on the corner of Third Avenue and Union Street in downtown Nashville. The First National Bank of Nashville was originally organized in 1863. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: First National Bank (Nashville, Tenn.)
